mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_CD, UPP_DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM, DEPT_SORT_ODR FROM dept
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dept WHERE DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept (DEPT_CD, UPP_DEPT_CD, DEPT_MNGR_EMPL_NO, DEPT_NM, ENG_DEPT_NM, DEPT_SORT_ODR, FST_REGR_IDNF_NO, LAST_UPDR_IDNF_NO) VALUES (#{deptCd}, #{uppDeptCd}, (SELECT EMPL_NO FROM empl WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}), #{deptNm}, #{engDeptNm}, #{deptSortOdr}, #{fstRegrIdnfNo}, #{lastUpdrIdnfNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE dept SET UPP_DEPT_CD = #{uppDeptCd}, DEPT_SORT_ODR = #{deptSortOdr}, LAST_UPDR_IDNF_NO = #{lastUpdrIdnfNo}, Last_UPD_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} AND (UPP_DEPT_CD <> #{uppDeptCd} OR DEPT_SORT_ODR <> #{deptSortOdr})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dept WHERE DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} AND 0 = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blng_dept WHERE BLNG_DEPT_CD = #{deptCd})
mapper.update: update dept set DEPT_MNGR_EMPL_NO = (select EMPL_NO from empl where EMPL_ID = #{emplId}), DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}, ENG_DEPT_NM = #{engDeptNm}, LAST_UPD_DTM = current_timestamp, LAST_UPDR_IDNF_NO = #{lastUpdrIdnfNo} where DEPT_CD = #{deptCd};
mapper.select: SELECT d.DEPT_CD, d.DEPT_NM, d.ENG_DEPT_NM, e.EMPL_ID, e.PRF_PHOTO_PATH, e.RNM, e.ENG_NM, e.EMPNO, e.EMAIL FROM empl e INNER JOIN blng_dept b ON e.EMPL_NO = b.BLNG_EMPL_NO RIGHT JOIN dept d ON b.BLNG_DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD WHERE d.DEPT_CD=#{deptCd}

SELECT d.DEPT_NM, d.ENG_DEPT_NM, d.DEPT_CD, e.EMPL_ID, e.PRF_PHOTO_PATH, e.RNM, e.ENG_NM, e.EMPNO, e.EMAIL, c.CDR_DEPT_CNT FROM dept d LEFT JOIN empl e ON e.EMPL_NO = d.DEPT_MNGR_EMPL_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UPP_DEPT_CD, COUNT(*) AS CDR_DEPT_CNT FROM dept WHERE UPP_DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} ) c ON c.UPP_DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD WHERE d.DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}
